mapper.insert: INSERT INTO future_daily_price (contract_name,date,opening_price,closing_price,the_highest_price,the_lowest_price, average_price,oc_spread,hl_spread, open_interest,volume,created_at) VALUES (#{contractName},#{date},#{openingPrice},#{closingPrice},#{theHighestPrice},#{theLowestPrice}, #{averagePrice},#{ocSpread},#{hlSpread},#{openInterest},#{volume},sysdate())
